nodes.text: Rikard was a Force-sensitive Filordus who, like other Filordi, had no gender. A youth during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, Rikard lived in Efellis on the planet Caarimon and worked as an errand runner. The heroes of Cularin encountered the young Filordus when they were investigating a plot to release a virus on Caarimon. The heroes thwarted the plot, and Rikard attended a celebration that was held by the Metatheran Cartel to thank them on the moon Dorumaa in the Cularin system.
